## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                            | Type                            | Default    |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `alignment` | `alignment` | Aligns child elements. Defaults to center of viewport. | `"bottom" \| "center" \| "top"` | `"center"` |
| `open`      | `open`      | If true, displays the modal element                    | `boolean`                       | `false`    |
